wikipedia_page.main: Laura Lee Dockrill (born 28 May 1986) is an English author and performance poet.

response: *Butterfly Brain (2018) for narrator, soprano/instrumentalist, 'cellist/vocalist and percussionist/vocalist, words by Laura Dockrill

She was born in London, studied in Chichester and currently lives in Hastings on the south coast of England. Her background is unconventional for a film director as she worked as a hairdresser and stand-up comedian,GreenFingerFilms, September 2016 before winning a place on ITV’s Metroland, a series for first time directors, with I have the gift, a documentary film about Leon, a postman in Brixton who claims to have abilities of psychic gifts and provides both physical and spiritual support.Metroland: I have the Gift, British Film Institute, 1995  Green is the mother of spoken word artist and author Laura Dockrill.Ian Burrell, Laura Dockrill - a poet for the ipod generation, The Independent, July, 2009
* Lorali series by Laura Dockrill (2015–17): Lorali and Aurabel, mermaids
* Laura Dockrill (born 1986), English performance poet, author, illustrator and short story writer
